name: Myth
storyline:
If you enjoy games centered around the concept of the Backrooms, you will find this game intriguing as it adopts a school theme. "Myth" is an online co-op horror game designed for up to 4 players, where you and your friends can delve into the mysteries of a haunted school while unraveling intricate puzzles. As a character in the game, you embark on a desperate quest to locate your missing friend. However, the school authorities have suppressed any information regarding the disappearance, compelling you and your friend to take matters into your own hands.

The goal of this game is simple: for each level, you need to find a password, and in order to obtain the password, you must solve puzzles.
summary: Myth is a puzzle horror multiplayer game that guarantees an intense and headache-inducing experience with friends. Why the headache, you ask? Well, let's just say the puzzles are so mind-bendingly hard, they should come with a complimentary bottle of aspirin!
